title: CHEESEBURGERS WITH PEPPERY COLESLAW
directions: Toss coleslaw mix, Hellmann's速 or Best Foods速 Light Mayonnaise and lime juice in large bowl; refrigerate until ready to serve.

Combine ground beef, garlic powder and black pepper in another large bowl; shape into 4 burgers. Grill or broil, turning once, until desired doneness. Top with cheese and cook until cheese is melted. Serve in buns with lettuce, tomato, avocado, olives and coleslaw.

Calories 450 ,Calories from Fat 150 ,Total Fat 17 g,Saturated Fat 4.5 g,Trans Fat 0 g,Cholesterol 85 mg,Sodium 620 mg,Total Carbs 37 g,Dietary Fiber 7 g,Sugars 10 g,Protein 39 g,Vitamin A 70 %,Vitamin C 110 %,Calcium 40 %,Iron 25 %
ingredients: 1/2 cup Hellmann's速 or Best Foods速 Light Mayonnaise
